synopsis.text: This thrilling anime takes us on a journey with Nobita and his companions as they discover a mysterious frozen ring that leads them to the icy expanses of Antarctica. In search of the ring's owner, they unexpectedly uncover ancient ruins hiding a colossal secret. As they delve deeper, they learn about a time when Earth was entirely encased in ice, transforming it into a snowball planet for millions of years. Brace yourself for a chilling adventure as Doraemon and his friends embark on a mission to unravel this secret, while facing the peril of Earth plunging back into another ice age. This original story promises an exhilarating escapade packed with unexpected twists and turns that will keep you on the edge of your seat.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
